TopicTitle: EVA at KSC wrecked save game (kerbin GONE)

Articles.Content:
Had a parts test contract landed, and figured I'd give Bob a job to EVA and walk around a little (needed a couple points for the tech tree for my mun mission).

Did tests, EVAed, and screen went black. Reverted to VAB, tried againÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ in space, but nothing else shows. Quit, reloaded saveÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ no Kerbin at all, gone. So much for my 1.0 career.

LOL, I don't normally QS ever. Guess I will now.

> 
> [LOG 14:17:23.043] [00:00:00]: Bob Kerman from Untitled Space Craft went on EVA.[LOG 14:17:23.111] [FLIGHT GLOBALS]: Switching To Vessel Bob Kerman ---------------------- 
> [LOG 14:17:23.112] stage manager resuming...
> 
> [ERR 14:17:24.927] Invalid parameter because it was infinity or nan.
> 
> [ERR 14:17:24.927] Invalid parameter because it was infinity or nan.
> 
> ^^^about a zillion of that last line, with the odd set of:
> 
> LOG 14:17:24.978] Occlusion area test is NAN! Args 0.25035047853554 0.333842031320118 NaN
> 
> [LOG 14:17:24.978] part1: NaN
> 
> [LOG 14:17:24.978] part2: NaN
> 
> [LOG 14:17:24.978] part3: NaN
> 
> [ERR 14:17:24.978] Actor::setAngularDamping: The angular damping must be nonnegative!
> 
> thrown in here and there.

I should add that I have never had something like this happen before in earlier versions. I've had some isolated weirdness, but nothing catastrophic.
Occlusion test is new for 1.0 so no one would have seen it prior to this, very strange, what about other vessels in that save?
